game.name: Undertale Red & Yellow
game.desc: Undertale Red & Yellow is a mod for the game Undertale that incorporates elements from Undertale Yellow, a fan game by Shinix. It features Frisk, the protagonist, accompanied by two head ghosts, Chara and Clover, as they navigate through the Underground. The mod includes additional content such as new interactions, minigames, and mini-bosses, which significantly extend the gameplay experience.
